content.raw: In any case, I suspect the problem is that the whoever attempted to link the accounts made a machine user account in Bitbucket called “osrfautobuild” and a “build” group which has admin permissions for the Bitbucket vrx repository, but did not check the box that enables the group members to “Administer team.” This prevents the machine user’s account from authorizing access to the repositories that are owned by the team, even though it may have admin access to those repositories.
content.html: In any case, I suspect the problem is that the whoever attempted to link the accounts made a machine user account in Bitbucket called “osrfautobuild” and a “build” group which has admin permissions for the Bitbucket vrx repository, but did not check the box that enables the group members to “Administer team.” This prevents the machine user’s account from authorizing access to the repositories that are owned by the team, even though it may have admin access to those repositories.
